title: SYSTEM AND NETWORK ADMÄ°NÄ°STRATOR
personal_info:
System and Network Administrator with 2+ years of experience. Skilled in configuring and maintaining network infrastructure (VLAN
creation, security policy configuration on Fortigate, network service administration). Experienced with hypervisors and virtualization
management systems (VMware ESXi, Proxmox, Hyper-V, vCenter) for deploying and maintaining virtual infrastructure. Proficient in
administering Active Directory, including configuration and management of Group Policies (GPO). Possess strong skills in network
traffic analysis and diagnostics (Wireshark, Nmap), as well as basic knowledge of information security and penetration testing tools
(Burp Suite, Metasploit).
Key Skills
â€¢ Security Analysis Tools: Wireshark, Nmap, Dork List, Netstat, Wappalyzer, Burp Suite, Metasploit, OpenVAS
â€¢ Networking Technologies: Knowledge of network protocols such as EtherChannel, Router on the Stick, DHCP Snooping,
DHCP Relay, IPsec, GRE, GRE over IPsec, STP, VTP, UDLD, RIP v2, EIGRP, OSPF, BGP, Access List. Configuration of VLANs,
creating and managing policies on Fortigate, working with network equipment (routers, Layer 2 and Layer 3 switches)
â€¢ Operating Systems: Experienced with Unix-based systems and Windows Server.
â€¢ Certifications: Voice and Network/System Administrator, Fortigate Administrator Certificate from MUK training center
â€¢ Server Security: Compliance with PCI DSS standards, adherence to ISO 21007 standards
â€¢ Training and Awareness: Conducting cybersecurity hygiene training for employees
â€¢ Log Management: Experience with ELK stack for log collection and analysis
Work Experience
Information Security Specialist
â€¢ Worked in a team, performing tasks related to the protection and analysis of infrastructure security.
â€¢ Conducted checks of servers and systems for compliance with PCI DSS standards.
â€¢ Conducted cybersecurity hygiene training for employees and ensured adherence to security standards such as ISO 21007.
Education
â€¢ Completed 11 grades at school No. 39, Narimanov District
Languages
â€¢ Azerbaijani: C2 (Native)
â€¢ Russian: C2
â€¢ English: B1
Additional Information
â€¢ Driverâ€™s License: Categories B and C

Configuration of VLANs, creating and managing policies on Fortigate, working with network equipment (routers, Layer 2 and Layer 3 switches)

skills:
UX/UI Design Skills
Hard Skills
User Research & Audience Analysis â€“ Conducting qualitative and quantitative research (interviews, surveys, competitor analysis) to understand user needs and behaviors.
Hypothesis Formulation â€“ Creating testable, data-driven assumptions to improve product usability and guide design decisions.
Wireframing & Prototyping â€“ Developing low- and high-fidelity wireframes and interactive prototypes in Figma to visualize and validate design concepts.
UI Design Principles â€“ Applying layout, color theory, typography, spacing, and accessibility best practices to create clean, modern user interfaces.
Responsive & Adaptive Design â€“ Designing interfaces that function seamlessly across mobile, tablet, and desktop devices.
Design Systems & UI Kits â€“ Creating and maintaining reusable design components to ensure visual consistency and development efficiency.
Tools & Platforms â€“ Advanced in Figma; Miro, Webflow. 
Branding & Visual Identity â€“ Designing consistent visual styles aligned with the brandâ€™s goals and target audience.
Soft Skills
Teamwork & Empathy â€“ Collaborating with cross-functional teams and understanding user perspectives to improve user experience.
Critical Thinking â€“ Evaluating user behavior and design decisions with a logical, problem-solving mindset.
Time Management â€“ Prioritizing tasks and meeting project deadlines effectively.
Creativity & Innovation â€“ Generating original design ideas and turning them into functional, user-friendly solutions.
Goal-Oriented Approach â€“ Staying focused on design outcomes aligned with user and business objectives.
Adaptability â€“ Quickly learning new tools, workflows, and feedback to adjust in dynamic environments.
Networking skills
Installation of local networks.
Laying and connecting Ethernet cables.
Initial configuration of network equipment: Cisco Switches, Cisco Routers.
What is EtherChannel and how to configure it.
What is VLAN, Native VLAN, Private VLAN, VTP, STP, DTP, PPP, Port Security, DHCP, DNS, DHCP snooping, NAT, Access list and its configuration.

experience_info:
Gallium Technologies Azerbaijan - Python/Django Developer (01.2023-01.2025)
Leadership & Team Management: Led and mentored a team of software developers, fostering a
collaborative environment to drive innovation and productivity. Established performance metrics and
conducted regular reviews to ensure team alignment with company goals.
Strategic Planning & Execution: Spearheaded the development and execution of technology strategies
aligned with business objectives. Developed roadmaps for key projects, balancing priorities to meet
deadlines and budget constraints.
Technical Oversight: Oversaw the development of scalable web applications using Django and Django
REST Framework. Ensured adherence to best practices in coding, testing, and deployment to maintain
high standards of quality and performance.
CRM & Management Systems Development: Designed and implemented comprehensive CRM and
management systems tailored to client needs. Developed features for customer relationship
management, data analytics, and reporting, enhancing client engagement and operational efficiency.
Cloud-Based Solutions: Led the development of cloud-based management systems. Implemented cloud
architecture and services to optimize application performance and cost-efficiency.
Koder Group - Python/Django Developer (02.2021 - 07.2021)
E-Commerce Projects: Led the development of several online shopping and e-commerce projects,
utilizing Django and Django REST Framework to build scalable and secure web applications.
Implemented features such as product catalogs, shopping carts, order processing, and customer
management.
API Development & Integration: Designed and developed RESTful APIs to support front-end applications
and third-party services. Ensured APIs were robust, secure, and optimized for performance.
Payment Gateway Integrations: Successfully integrated various payment gateways into e-commerce
platforms, including Binance Pay and LemonsQueezy. Ensured secure and seamless payment
processing, addressing any issues related to transactions and compliance.
Containerization & Deployment: Utilized Docker for containerization, streamlining development and
deployment processes. Created Docker images and managed container orchestration to ensure
consistent environments across development, testing, and production.
Project Architecture & Design: Architected and implemented the core systems of e-commerce platforms,
including database design, application structure, and integration points. Applied best practices in
software engineering to ensure high performance and reliability

title: SÃœRÃœCÃœ
personal_info:
Shexsi avtomobilim var 2020-20201 model,  temizliyi sevirem, shexsi gigienama ve avtomobilimin saz veziyyeti ve temizliyi mene onemlidir. Her gansi bir derman firmasi, shirniyyat firmiasina rayonlara qeydiyyata veya diger sened ishlerine diqqetli, mesuliyyetli ve  bacariqliyam. Eger maash vaxtinda verilerse muherrik yagi ve yanacaq odenishleri, elece de ezamiyyet odenishleri shirket terefinden qarshilanarsa men de oz novbemde ishimde maximum mesuliyyetle davranacaq ve qusursuz calishacaqam.
35 yashim var. Aileliyem 2 evladim var. Ali tehsilliyem. Elece de 2022ci ilde respublika cempionu olmusham klassik fitnessde ve peshekar derecem var. Rus ve ingilis dillerinde selis danishiram. Mehkumluqum yoxdur.
Uzun illÉ™r surucu ishlemishem 8 yashimdan avtomobil surmushem, 2008ci ilde ilk suruculuk vesiqemi almisham, muxtelif mashinlar surmushem, yuk ve sernishin. Turizm sectorunda 2016ci ilden Mercedes viano ve sprinter idare etmishem rayonlara.

Summary
I am a developer with a keen eye for design, focused on building functional, user-friendly websites that also offer visual
clarity. For the past two years, I have been actively working on web projects while continuously expanding my skill set
through modern technologies. My goal is to deliver robust, scalable, and well-structured web solutions that prioritise
performance, reliability, and clean code architecture. You can explore my "GitHub account: Nijat-Guliyev" for those interested in my projects.
Projects
I have created a lot of front-end projects and shared them on GitHub. These include websites, games, and UI components
built using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Some of my projects focus on layout and design (like landing pages), while others
are more about interactivity (like a dice game, to-do list, or quiz app). Most of them were built to practice and improve
specific skills, and each one helped me learn something new. I continue to update my GitHub as I grow.
Work Experience
I am currently working on personal and practice projects while learning full-stack web development. My GitHub includes
over 40+ repositories showing my growth. I am actively preparing for my first junior developer opportunity.
